bookmarklets.name: Default (full version)
bookmarklets.note:
A full, independent version of Server Clock. 
You may have to visit this page and update your bookmarklet manually.
bookmarklets.instruction:
Drag the above link to your browser bookmark bar.
Or, you can click the link to copy the code.

bookmarklets.name: Launcher
bookmarklets.note:
A lightweight launcher that will always fetch and run the latest version of Server Clock. 
The launcher may not work on webpages with strict content security policy.
bookmarklets.instruction:
Drag the above link to your browser bookmark bar.
Or, you can click the link to copy the code.

bookmarklets.name: test_accuracy.js
bookmarklets.note: A console-only, test version of Server Clock.
bookmarklets.instruction:
Drag the above link to your browser bookmark bar.
Or, you can click the link to copy the code.
Visit www.timeapi.io for testing.
